response.overview: The film depicts a picture of disappointment, of everyday living, with sickeningly painful achievements and failures, between two people. Mariana's need to heal herself and with herself is amplified by another component, namely, the future life she wants without compromise. Will he succeed?! Will he be able to "face" the reflection of an undefiled love with the maturity of the moments that hurt, doubled by the remorse that haunts his being?! Can we of the present give up the sincerity that moved us in the past? It is very clear that the need for healing exists within each of us. Can we or can't we, run away or not?!
response.title: Viața unei singure femei
